options.window: ESP window in the form of project/contquery/window
options.mincpu: The minimum CPU usage, in percentage, to report (defaults to 5)
options.interval: The interval, in seconds, at which to report information (defaults to 1)
options.counts: boolean value determining whether or not to report window event counts (defaults to false)
options.config: boolean value determining whether or not to report server configuration info (defaults to false)
options.memory: boolean value determining whether or not to report server memory usage info (defaults to true)
